K10D0115_H0118:307b-1: a'arya su kha ba ti by'u ha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /

K10D0115_H0118:307b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0115_H0118:308a-2: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
K10D0115_H0118:308a-3: gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis
K10D0115_H0118:308a-4: brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po

K10D0115_H0118:308a-10: k'a ty'a'i bu chen po dang /

K10D0115_H0118:308a-25: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10D0115_H0118:308a-26: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa dang /

K10D0115_H0118:308a-31: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10D0115_H0118:308a-32: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /

K10D0115_H0118:308b-7: pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes
K10D0115_H0118:308b-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

K10D0115_H0118:308b-11: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
K10D0115_H0118:308b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams de ci'i phyir bde ba can zhes bya zhe na /
K10D0115_H0118:308b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na sems can rnams kyi lus la sdug bsngal med /
K10D0115_H0118:308b-17: sems la sdug bsngal med cing bde ba'i rgyu chad med par yod de /
K10D0115_H0118:308b-18: de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya'o //
K10D0115_H0118:308b-20: gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can ni kha khyer rim pa bdun dang /
K10D0115_H0118:308b-21: shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang /
K10D0115_H0118:308b-22: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba /
K10D0115_H0118:308b-23: bkra ba blta na sdug pa'o //
K10D0115_H0118:308b-25: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rin po che sna bzhi la 'di lta ste /

K10D0115_H0118:309a-3: gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na
K10D0115_H0118:309a-4: rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing yan lag brgyad
K10D0115_H0118:309a-5: dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba /
K10D0115_H0118:309a-6: rin po che'i padmas khebs pa /
K10D0115_H0118:309a-7: bya rog gis btung du rung bar kha da chad
K10D0115_H0118:309a-8: du gyur pa gser gyi bye ma bdal ba dag
K10D0115_H0118:309a-9: yod de / rdzing de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun na them skas bkra ba /
K10D0115_H0118:309a-15: rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa bzhi bzhi yod do //
K10D0115_H0118:309a-16: rdzing de dag gi 'gram na rin po che'i shing
K10D0115_H0118:309a-17: ljon pa rin po che sna bdun la 'di lta
K10D0115_H0118:309a-25: blta na sdug pa dag skyes so //

K10D0115_H0118:309a-35: ser po lta bur ston pa /

K10D0115_H0118:309a-42: dkar po lta bur ston pa /
K10D0115_H0118:309b-0: 'od bkra ba 'byung @309b pa; bkra ba lta bur

K10D0115_H0118:309b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing

K10D0115_H0118:309b-5: dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o //
K10D0115_H0118:309b-7: gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra rtag tu 'byung ngo //
K10D0115_H0118:309b-8: sa chen po ni gser gyi kha dog lta bu ste nyams dga' ba'o //
K10D0115_H0118:309b-9: sh'a ri'i bu; sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sangs
K10D0115_H0118:309b-10: rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa
K10D0115_H0118:309b-11: de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o //
K10D0115_H0118:309b-13: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin lan gsum /

K10D0115_H0118:309b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang me tog skon bu bye ba phrag 'bum mngon par 'thor te /
K10D0115_H0118:309b-20: gtor nas nyin mo gnas pa'i phyir slar 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du 'dong ngo //
K10D0115_H0118:309b-22: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0115_H0118:309b-23: gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu

K10D0115_H0118:310a-2: rang rang gi skad dag gis smra'o //
K10D0115_H0118:310a-3: de dag smra ba na dbang po dang /
K10D0115_H0118:310a-5: byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dag 'byung ngo //

K10D0115_H0118:310a-7: sgra de thos nas sangs rgyas yid la byed pa
K10D0115_H0118:310a-8: skye / chos yid la byed pa skye /
K10D0115_H0118:310a-9: dge 'dun yid la byed par skye'o //

K10D0115_H0118:313a-10: khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs
K10D0115_H0118:313a-11: su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su
K10D0115_H0118:313a-12: bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches
K10D0115_H0118:313a-13: par gyis shig ces gsung pa mdzad do //
K10D0115_H0118:313a-14: de bzhin du steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog ces bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'od ces bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi phung po zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rigs zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen autpa la'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313b-0: de @313b bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313b-1: de dag la sogs pa steng gi phyogs kyi sangs
K10D0115_H0118:313b-2: rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed
K10D0115_H0118:313b-3: dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags
K10D0115_H0118:313b-4: kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de /
K10D0115_H0118:313b-5: khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs
K10D0115_H0118:313b-6: su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su
K10D0115_H0118:313b-7: bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches
K10D0115_H0118:313b-8: par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do //
K10D0115_H0118:313b-11: ci'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams
K10D0115_H0118:313b-12: cad kyis yongs su bzung ba zhes bya zhe na
K10D0115_H0118:313b-14: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan thos par gyur pa dang /
K10D0115_H0118:313b-16: thos pa dang thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams
K10D0115_H0118:313b-17: cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su
K10D0115_H0118:313b-20: sems can gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
K10D0115_H0118:313b-21: pa 'od dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
K10D0115_H0118:313b-22: rten gyi khams bde ba can du sems kyis smon
K10D0115_H0118:313b-25: byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na
K10D0115_H0118:313b-26: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
K10D0115_H0118:314a-0: @314a *// ji ltar da ltar nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0115_H0118:314a-1: de dag gi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa
K10D0115_H0118:314a-2: yongs su brjod pa de bzhin du /
K10D0115_H0118:314a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang nga'i yon
K10D0115_H0118:314a-5: tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod do
K10D0115_H0118:314a-8: sh'akya'i rgyal pos bskal pa'i snyigs ma dang /
K10D0115_H0118:314a-9: nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /
K10D0115_H0118:314a-10: sems can gyi snyigs ma dang /
K10D0115_H0118:314a-12: tshe'i snyigs ma'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
K10D0115_H0118:314a-13: du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0115_H0118:314a-14: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K10D0115_H0118:314a-15: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos bstan
K10D0115_H0118:314a-16: pa ni ngo mtshar lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis
K10D0115_H0118:314a-17: bka' stsal pa / sh'a ri'i bu /
K10D0115_H0118:314a-18: snyigs ma lnga'i tshe 'jig rten du ngas gang 'jig
K10D0115_H0118:314a-19: rten gyi khams mi mjed du bla na med pa
K10D0115_H0118:314a-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
K10D0115_H0118:314a-22: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos bstan pa de ni mchog tu dka' ba byed pa'o //
K10D0115_H0118:314a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10D0115_H0118:314a-24: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10D0115_H0118:314a-25: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0115_H0118:314b-0: dri @314b zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0115_H0118:314b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0115_H0118:314b-2: 'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0115_H0118:314b-3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'a na sh'i la dang /
K10D0115_H0118:314b-4: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes
